children.text: If the enemy is not invulnerable or shielded, it will be damaged
If the enemy is shielded, the bullet will be destroyed
Big enemies have a death sequence before exploding...
Zoom into the playfield, then slow down and reverse to match the level scrolling
Behavior State. Toggles from 0 to 1 every 3 seconds. When 0, ship will shoot 4 bullets from top turrets every 0.5 seconds. When 1, ship will shoot rapid bullets from its red orb.

Fly away. After 10 seconds of being activated, the ship will deactivate and fly away. To prevent the ship's attacks from being cut off, we wait until Behavior_Timer = 0 when the ship's behavior state is changing.
Stop moving upwards when reaching end of level
Rotate towards player after some time
Destroy enemies if too far from view port / play field
Create particle over every bullet shot
